issue.title: [R][Docs] Update dataset vignette
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16509](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16509). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since the dataset vignette was written, we've added join, aggregation, and distinct support (and soon union/union_all support). The dataset vignette currently says we don't support those operations.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16509?focusedCommentId=17541174) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13178
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13178>
